A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Very disappointing! They have treated the Star Wars mythology and lore with utter contempt in this diabolical disjointed movie\, which gives true Star Wars fans the bird whilst trying to force feed viewers with a political agenda.

Carefully woven themes and plots from the previous movie are unceremoniously dumped in this one.
